solution_line_template: In the first month, the song will have {current_listens} * {doubling_factor} = <<{current_listens}*{doubling_factor}={listens_month1}>>{listens_month1} listens.
In the second month, the song will have {listens_month1} * {doubling_factor} = <<{listens_month1}*{doubling_factor}={listens_month2}>>{listens_month2} listens.
In the third month, the song will have {listens_month2} * {doubling_factor} = <<{listens_month2}*{doubling_factor}={listens_month3}>>{listens_month3} listens.

By the end of the year Jordan's song will have a total of {current_listens} + {listens_month1} + {listens_month2} + {listens_month3} = <<{current_listens}+{listens_month1}+{listens_month2}+{listens_month3}={total_listens}>>{total_listens} listens.
